title: Characters Fonts Foundry launches RSS feed
content:
Characters Font Foundry has made an own **RSS feed** available for anyone who wants to be informed.  
A lot of things will change this year and a lot of fonts will be released. Very soon 10 of my fonts will be sold through [Veer](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014000917/http:/www.veer.com/). The complete Nordic Narrow family will be available in the next weeks at [Fountain](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014000917/http:/www.fountain.nu/).

Here's the feed address to subscribe to:  
 [http://www.characters.nl/rss/rss.xml](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014000917/http:/www.characters.nl/rss/rss.xml "http://www.characters.nl/rss/rss.xml")

With this feed I will keep you informed on new releases, interesting newsfacts, updates and much more.

Best regards,  
®ené
author: Rene Verkaart
